Title: 39280 - Writer's Choice
Direction: 500 words: Places to Relax in Miami/Where to Relax in Miami. Discuss different relaxing places in Miami. Generic places like "the beach" or "the park" aren't going to make a particularly good piece of content. But it could be pretty compelling if they discuss cool spots like the Wynwood Arts district, the Bal harbor high-end shopping district, Allison Park or Indian Beach Park (both on Miami beach), etc. IMPORTANT: The AT needs to be used in a contextually relevant way. Preferably it should be relevant to the whole paragraph in which it exists - can't just be slapped in there.
